Writers.

Ankit Verma

Ankit began reviewing films after suffering through Anchorman 2. His disgruntled Facebook status after the viewing received 18 likes which was enough validation to start up a film review blog. The blog eventually caught the eye of veteran Dear Cast & Crew writer, Jared Young. Ankit studied Copywriting and Social Strategy through the Advertising & Marketing Communications Management program at Algonquin College.
